data.text: So many things I enjoyed about this hotel - staff was excellent, bed comfortable, location was perfect. What sets it apart is the small galley kitchen, with a fold out table and chairs, where we enjoyed having our breakfast and a take out dinner when we needed a break from running around. We stayed in a deluxe room on the 4th floor overlooking George Orwell square. With the windows closed, noise was never an issue. In the evenings we opened the windows, and had a glass of wine on our sofa and enjoyed the lively feeling of the square. My only issue was very little counter space in the bathroom. I used a shelf in the kitchen and it was handy enough for my many items. I really loved it here and would definitely stay again.
data.title: Would stay here again!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Laura,
Thank you for your review.

We are thrilled to learn that our dedicated staff, comfortable bedding, and prime location in the heart of Barcelona contributed to a memorable experience for you. 
It is delightful to hear that the unique features of our deluxe rooms, such as the small galley kitchen and the folding table and chairs, provided you with the convenience and comfort to enjoy breakfast and a relaxing dinner. 
We are also pleased that the tranquility of your 4th-floor room and the vibrant views over George Orwell square added to the enjoyment of your stay. 
We appreciate your comment regarding the bathroom counter space. While our historical building offers a certain charm and character, it does sometimes present spatial limitations. 
However, we are glad to know that the shelf in the kitchen served as an effective solution for your needs. 
Rest assured, we constantly strive to improve our guest experience and your feedback is invaluable to us.

We all look forward to the pleasure of seeing you on a future visit. 
Best regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: This hotel is in a great location in the Barri Gotic. The hotel staff are friendly and available 24/7. There is no restaurant on site, so breakfast is delivered to your room (which we didn't do and decided to eat at local coffee shops/cafes). There is a rooftop with a pool, but it was cloudy and/or rainy the entire time we were there so I can't comment on it. We stayed on the 5th floor in the Jewel suite - very nice 2 bedroom, 2 bath room; this could work for 2 couples, as there is a main door for the suite and then 2 separate hotel doors for each bedroom/bath. Note though that the second bedroom is 2 twin sized sofa beds. Also, the main bedroom only has a queen bed that is very firm. There is a lot of noise outside (the main bedroom is off the street and the twin bedroom off the square with restaurants; however, the sliding doors are pretty soundproof and the AC works great! The terraces were lovely for each room. We enjoyed them even though the hot tubs for each could not be used due to the drought. Both bathrooms have hand-held shower nozzle and rainfall showers. Bath products are provided, but note that there is no separate hair conditioner (only a shampoo with conditioner), so bring your own if you have curly/frizzy hair like me!
data.title: Great location and wonderful AC

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Debra,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.

We are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us and that you received such courteous and professional service from our team members.

We are, however, sorry to hear your bed wasnâ€™t up to the standard you've come to expect from us. Please do not hesitate to bring any issues or concerns to our attention at the time, so that we may take action.

We all look forward to the pleasure of seeing you on a future visit. 
Best regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: If I come back to Barcelona I will definitely stay here again. Quiet but central between the older part and las Ramblas. The building itself was very beautiful and authentic. I would make one small suggestion. To have a card that is easily identifiable in the room showing the faciltiies and reception number etc. I think there was one but it wasn't obvious to me. But absolutely beautiful place. And great coffee pods!
data.title: Aparthotel Arai review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive review.

We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the tranquility and central position of our location, nestled between the charm of the Gothic Quarter and the vibrancy of Las Ramblas. 

Your kind words about the beauty and authenticity of our building fill us with pride, as we strive to maintain the historical elegance of our property while providing modern comforts.

Regarding your helpful suggestion, we will certainly consider making the information about our amenities and reception number more prominent for our guests' convenience. 

Your feedback is invaluable to us in our ongoing efforts to enhance our guest experience.

We hope to have the pleasure of seeing you again on a future visit.
Best regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: The room was gorgeous, with double pane windows that keep it quiet at night. Plenty of room for three of us and a delightful staff. The location is ideal for the beach, Picasso Museum, the Art district and the quaint Jewish Quarter. We will stay at Arai on all future stays.
data.title: The perfect Barcelona launching spot.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.

We're thrilled to hear that the room met your expectations and provided a quiet haven during the night, thanks to our soundproofed windows. It's also wonderful to know that our team's efforts contributed to a delightful stay for you and your companions. We take pride in our prime location that allows guests to easily access the city's cultural hotspots and charming quarters.

We are always here to ensure our guests have an exceptional stay, and reviews like yours make our commitment even stronger.

We hope that you will be able to return for another great experience. 
Kind regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: excellent facilities , great room in a beautiful building in a really good location. We had an executive room on the first floor which was located above a square at the back of the hotel. The soundproofing in the room was pretty good and the room was very comfortable with a nice sofa too. The staff were professional and very helpful and responsive. The facilities were really good. White company toiletries were a nice touch.
data.title: Great Aparthotel in an historic building

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for this review of your recent stay.

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the exquisite charm of our historic building and found the executive room to your liking, especially its comfort and the added luxury of White Company toiletries. 
It's also wonderful to know that our staff's professionalism and responsiveness contributed to a pleasant stay. Your commendation of our facilities is greatly appreciated, and we take pride in maintaining the high standards that you experienced.
While you've not mentioned any specific concerns, we always strive to perfect our guests' experiences in every possible way.

We look forward to welcoming you back in the future. 
Take care,

Greg Behn, General Manager
